descriptionTitle: Rent Arround is a E Commerce Project for Rent anything from anywhere
description: that aim to provide a convenient and user-friendly platform for renting various items across multiple categories. It connects individuals looking to rent out items with those in need of temporary access to products, fostering a flexible sharing economy.

descriptionTitle: Journey App is a versatile platform for booking multiple events across various locations
description: Contributed to the Journey App project, Implemented API integration using Redux Toolkit for efficient state management and seamless data flow. Styled the application using SCSS components, ensuring a clean and consistent user interface.

descriptionTitle: Office Management System project is a task and project management, document management.
description: Focusing on key roles such as user authentication, task and project management, calendar integration, document management, and communication modules.
built on Next.js and React. A fast and responsive single page application.
